title: Multiplayer Game
description: I used this very same project to sell this Roguelike game on the Japanese market.    http://dlsoft.dmm.com/detail/pkst_0001/    Compared to my multiplayer asset, this has many more functions and templates which makes it a full game.
longDescription:
Video


A 100% Blueprint Ready Multiplier Project project with parts and features ready to allow you to create your own Multiplier Game.


Feature:

• Ready to go multiplayer system

• AI Bots 100% Blueprints which work in multiplayer as well

• Multiplayer Inventory

• Menu Settings for Sound and more

• UMG Damage and Health bar

• Random Dungeon generation

• Item Pick Up System

• Item Drop System

• Fight System with Damage

• Trap Functions

• LevelUp Experience System

• Procedural Dungeon Creating System

• UMG marker system

• Boss Enemy System

• Multiple types of enemy systems

• GamePad compatible

• Teksha for game: 30


Sample Contents

Forum

Document
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints: 74


List of features:

2D Sound Manager: 2D Sound Manager System

3D SoundManager: 3D Sound Manager System

AICharacter_Controller: Control AI attack

EnemyCharacter: Handles a nice AI base

AIInterface: interface of Enemy AI

AnimeInterface: Character animation interface

BTS_VisionCheck: Process a nice AI vision check

BTT_Attack: A nice AI attack starts

BTT_SetWalkSpeed: Adjust the nice AI movement speed

BTT_WanderToPoint: Control random motion of nice AI

PlayerCharacter: Operate the player character

etc ...


Input: Xbox game pad, keyboard, mouse

Network replication: yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows, Mac, Linux

releaseInfo.releaseNote: bug fix and Add BP Comment
